title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.3 - Pilot station on the Hudson River
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.3 - Pilot station on the Hudson River

State Regulations

Hudson River pilots and Sandy Hook pilots relieved by or
relieving Hudson River pilots shall board or leave off Yonkers or at some other
convenient and safe location authorized by the commissioners. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
53.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
